LanguageData.PPotionAntiradiation.label: Antiradiation potion
LanguageData.PPotionAntiradiation.description: A potion for preventing radiation before they take hold. Blocks toxic buildup. Must be taken every five days to remain effective.
LanguageData.PPotionBerserk.label: Berserk potion
LanguageData.PPotionBerserk.description: A potion that leads to berserk.
LanguageData.PPotionCatatonia.label: Catatonia potion
LanguageData.PPotionCatatonia.description: A potion that leads to catatonia.
LanguageData.PPotionFireStartingSpree.label: Fire starting spree potion
LanguageData.PPotionFireStartingSpree.description: A potion that leads to fire starting spree.
LanguageData.PPotionImmunizationI.label: Potion of immunization
LanguageData.PPotionImmunizationI.description:
A potion for preventing infections before they take hold. Blocks malaria, sleeping sickness, plague. Must be taken every five days to remain effective.
This potion only prevents new infections. It does not cure existing infections - even those that are not yet discovered.
LanguageData.PPotionImmunizationII.label: Potion of adv. immunization
LanguageData.PPotionImmunizationII.description:
A potion for preventing infections before they take hold. Blocks all vanilla diseases. Must be taken every five days to remain effective.
This potion only prevents new infections. It does not cure existing infections - even those that are not yet discovered.
LanguageData.PPotionInsultingSpree.label: Insulting spree potion
LanguageData.PPotionInsultingSpree.description: A potion that leads to insulting spree.
LanguageData.PPotionSadWander.label: Sad wander potion
LanguageData.PPotionSadWander.description: A potion that leads to sad wander.
